data.name: Karma - A Visual Novel About A Dystopia.
data.detailed_description:
About



70 years have passed——

it is the time for you to payback.


"Hey, you know what?
——Blood can bring us peace and happiness."


In a land where heaven and hell coexist——

a story about a dystopia.

Information


Name : Karma
Type : Visual Novel
Ending : Single
Game Duration : Approx. 30-60 min.
Language : Traditional Chinese / English
Platform : PC (Steam) / Android
